DataElement.preferredName: Person Hypertension Encephalopathy Personal Medical History Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient has a history of hypertensive crisis or hypertensive encephalopathy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Hypertension Encephalopathy Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual that found a pathological increase in hypertension (blood pressure) or hypertensive encephalopathy (a functional and/or structural disorder of the brain caused by disease).

Property.preferredDefinition: Abnormally high blood pressure.:A disorder of the brain that can be caused by disease, injury, drugs, or chemicals.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Blood pressure that is abnormally high.
A functional and/or structural disorder of the brain caused by diseases (e.g. liver disease, kidney disease), medications, chemicals, and injuries.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
